answers.answer: I failed the first time but passed the 3 hr one. Good luck.
And im so worried that ill have to do the 3hr test. Ugh! This last test made me feel so weak!!
I failed 1 hour one 2 days ago by a smidge nurse said. I go for 3 hour one on monday. Not looking forward to that one
Darn it :/ ugh I dont mind the stuff we have to drink, its just the feeling you start feeling after awhile. Sick and dizzy. Ugh!

question: So I got my gestational diabetes test done yesterday and I wont know the results till tomorrow afternoon :/ gosh im worried. I hope it comes back negative!! How do you ladies cope with not knowing gaw its so worrisome!!
title: oh so nervous!!
